Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the histone H1/H5 family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Planococcus citreus (MIC=0.2-0.4 µM), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=0.2-0.4 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=0.4-0.8 µM), Listonella anguillarum (MIC=0.4-0.8 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: Potentially important role in mucosal defense.

Literature.Title: Isolation and characterisation of oncorhyncin II, a histone H1-derived antimicrobial peptide from skin secretions of rainbow trout, Oncorhynchus mykiss.
Literature.Author: Fernandes JM, Molle G, Kemp GD, Smith VJ.

Literature.Title: An H1 histone gene from rainbow trout (Salmo gairdnerii).
Literature.Author: Dixon G.H.,Winkfein R.J.,Connor W.,Mezquita J.
